name: Farm Stormer
description:
Farm Stormer

Created for Mini-Jam #26: "Storm"

Those darn Darby twins are at it again! They keep taking all my plane parts and trying to steal my customers away from my barnstorming business!

I know just the plan! Now, I wonder if there's any good building music I could play while I work on my plan to teach those Darby boys a lesson...

*Radio* "The weather today is going to be mostly sunny up until we get to the afternoon hours, when rain showers are expected to sweep through the area. Now for you hometown sports..."

Controls: ActionKeyboard*Mouse*AimArrow KeysMove Cursor
Fire WeaponXLeft ClickChange ElevationZRight Click

*Note: Use either Keyboard or Mouse. Not both!

What's new?
  1. Added Barn Heatlth Bar for better goal overview!
  2. Added Story Screen to appear in front of the game!
  3. Fixed a bug related to UI scaling.
  4. Fixed a bug where barn health would not reset for subsequent plays.
  5. Added Windows Build!
